title: Register players
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site
2. Enter Username/Password
3. Click Log In
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded
2. Fields work as expected
3. User is redirected to external user's home page

title: Fill in all required fields
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields
2. Click Next
custom_expected:
1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
2. Verify user is redirected to newly created International Amateur Player Profile

title: Send the player to BOC for verification
custom_steps:
1. Make sure all required fields are filled in
2. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. The Profile is successfuly submitted (should recieve a blue notication saying "Profile Submitted Successfully"
2. Registration status should be "Pending BOC Review"
3. Player should appear in BOC Registration Admin widget

title: Open the Help Page
custom_steps:
1. Click on the Help Link
2. Check Help page and review order
custom_expected:
1.Verify the Help page
2.Verify order of New Player Registration Instructions, Contact Information, and Email Us.

title: Verify player submission form updates to Correction Needed
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Run Test Case Fed_019

1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Registration Admin widget
3. Find Player submitted by Org
4. Open Player profile
5. Click Edit
6. Locate Registration Reviews section
7. Select any Correction-Needed options for the first review
8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. The Self Reg player should be visible in the list
4. Player profile should be opened in read only mode. Data from Org form should have been populated in to the profile.
5. Profile should go into edit mode
6. Registration Reviews section should be visible now in edit mode.
7. There should be a list of options to choose from, user should be able to select one of the correction needed statements.
8. Profile status should be updated to "Correction-Needed" and an Email should be generated and sent to the Org

title: So that it can be sent to BOC for verification
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields in Player Registration 
section. Select one of the following counties for 
Birth and Home Country:
- Dominican Republic
- Venezuela
- Panama
- Colombia
- Mexico
- Nicaragua
- Argentina
- Spain
- Costa Rica
- Ecuador
- El Salvador
- Guatemala
- Honduras
- Peru
2. Click Next
3. Fill in all fields. 
4. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
2. Verify user is redirected to newly created International Amateur Player Profile
3. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible
4. A notification should display to the Org "This registration is not yet complete and must be reviewed by MLB. You will receive a confirmation email once the profile has been verified." Registration Status for the player will be set to "Pending BOC Review". Player should be visible in the BOC's Registration Admin widget.

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (Spanish)
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Run Test Case Fed_028

1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the Org
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Correcci—n requerida - Major League Baseball (MLB) Registro internacional del prospecto.

Estimado %firstName %lastName, 

Su registro con la MLB ha sido revisado, pero no puede ser verificado por las MLB debido a la siguiente raz—n: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Su inscripci—n no est‡ completa hasta que las correcciones necesarias se realicen y el perfil sea verificado por un empleado de MLB. Si se verifica su inscripci—n, un correo elctr—nico de confirmaci—n ser‡ enviado a la direcci—n de correo electr—nico proporcionada. Si el registro aœn no se puede verificar, un correo electr—nico ser‡ enviado a la direcci—n de correo electr—nico proporcionada con instrucciones sobre c—mo corregir su perfil de registro. 

Si usted no recibe un correo electr—nico de confirmaci—n de su registro, o si tiene alguna pregunta, por favor no dude en poners en contacto con nosotros en registratio@mlb.com o (809) 518-2233.

title: Resubmitted to BOC for verification
custom_steps:
Pre-requisite: Run Test Case Fed_025 or 028

1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Search for the Player that the BOC has marked Correcton Needed
3. Open Player Profile
4. Click Edit
5. Update information
6. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. Player should appear after typing first three letters of name
3. Player profile should be opened in read only mode
4. ONLY Contact Information and Attached files should be editable. Everything else should be locked.
2. Fields and files work appropriately
3. Form should be resubmitted to BOC. BOC Registration Status should now be set to "Resubmitted to BOC"
